yourIdeaHasBeenAdded: Wo idea no ato mu, reyɛ icon image.
aiIconInfo: Ahosɛpɛw sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a w'atimredua no reyɛ no redi dwuma, wobetumi ato mu anaa wodwira ho adi akyi sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ahosɛpɛw no reyɛ no. Wobenya nhwɛso bio sɛ wopɛ sɛ woyɛ no foforo.
getColorFromLogo: Foforo kolor fii logo no mu
pleaseAnswerInThisLanguage: Mesrɛ wo, ka bio wɔ saa kasa yi mu
aboutGroupPrivacyOptionsCreateGroupDirec: Sɛ ɛyɛ Public a, obiara a ɔwɔ link no betumi ahyɛ wo nhyehyɛe ho nkɔ. Sɛ ɛyɛ Private a, ɛyɛ nnaanom nko ara (firi email) na nnipa a wɔbɛbɔ akawnt na wɔwɔ link no nko betumi ahyɛ.
aboutGroupPrivacyOptions: Sɛ wɔde nhoma no bɛyɛ Open to community a, community no na ɛkasa sɛ ɛyɛ public anaa private. Private nhoma no yɛ nnaanom nko ara (firi email) na nnipa a wɔbɛbɔ akawnt na wɔwɔ link no nko betumi kopa.
aboutStatusOptions: Featured, Active & Archived na ɛkasa nhoma no ho kwan wɔ community mu. Hidden nhoma no nni hɔ wɔ community nhoma mu na wɔsɛe wɔn firi search engines mu sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛtumi.
aboutStatusOptionsCreateGroupDirectly: Hidden nhoma no nni hɔ wɔ community nhoma mu na wɔsɛe wɔn firi search engines mu sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛtumi.
enableAiModeration: Ma AI Moderation Eto so (hwɛ moderation prompt aseɛ no)
allowAnswersNotForVoting: Nnipa a wɔde nhyehyɛe bɛto no nnyɛ bɛtumi nni ho votie
wikiSurveyActive: Survey no da so ma votie
confirmDeleteLogoImage: Wo yɛ ɔdɔɔso sɛ wopɛ sɛ woyi logo no anaa?
confirmDeleteVideo: Wo yɛ ɔdɔɔso sɛ wopɛ sɛ woyi video yi anaa?
closeAndGenerateIconInBackground: To mu na ɛbɛsɔ icon wɔ akyiri
rankedOrderInfo: Yi yɛ nhyehyɛe a wɔahyehyɛ wɔn sɛnea ɛda so wɔ votie mu
aiAnalysisInfo: Yi yɛ nhyehyɛe a GPT-4 abɔ otomatik mu firi nhyehyɛe ne votie mu
socialMediaCreateInfo: Din, nkɔmbɔ ne logo no betumi ayɛ wɔn ho adwuma sɛ wɔde bɛto so wɔ social media so
generateAnswersInfo: Nnipa a wɔde nhyehyɛe bɛto no sɛ wɔde mfirinu 3. Ma wɔn mfirinu 6 a ɛwɔ 140 nkarakrakra mu, ɛno biara wɔ lain mu.
aiAnalysisConfigInfo:
AI nyansapɔ a ɛyɛ otomatik yɛ adwuma a ɛfa wo LLM nkɔmhyɛ ase sɛ ɛbɔ mpae ma atiefoɔ a wɔn asɛm yɛ papa ne bɔne. Ɛyɛ ase sɛ ɛbɔ mpae ma asɛm a ɛwɔ so 3 papa ne 3 bɔne. Wobetumi de adwuma no to mu. Wɔn data ne sɛ:

[
{ ideasLabel: string; ideasIdsRange: number; analysisTypes:
[
{ label: string; contextPrompt: string; }
]
}
]
newIdeasNotAllowedForVotingInfo: (*) Sɛɛhyɛn yi nkyerɛ nnipa a wɔde wɔn nhyehyɛe bɛ.
minimumTenVotesInfo: Nkɔmhyɛe bɛyɛ adwuma wɔ ha sɛ wɔatumi abɛto mpoɔ du sɛ ɛrenya mpoɔ du.
minimumTenVotesToShowResults: Mpoɔ du du sɛ ɛbɛkyerɛ wɔ nson.
externalGoalParamsWhitelist: Nkɔso a ɛwɔ wɔ nkyɛw a ɛwɔ mu
allowAnonymousUsersToVote: Ma ɔdefoɔ bom sɛ ɔnni akawnt kwan so
loginToAddComment: Bɔ mu sɛ wopɛ sɛ woka nkɔmhyɛ
loginToAddCommentOrLink: Bɔ mu sɛ wopɛ sɛ woka nkɔmhyɛ anaa kɔnket
